description:
Yuri invites the depressed Ringo to a hot spring hotel to ease the pain of Shouma`s rejection. She also reveals that she was in the same class as Momoka when she was much younger. She claims that Momoka was the only one who ever loved her after finding out who she really was. Yuri approaches Ringo, telling her that she needs Ringo to become Momoka for her...
On the other hand, Shouma is regretting having said such cruel things to Ringo. He receives a message from Ringo, and then calls her to try and apologies, but when she picks up she seems to be saying some rather peculiar things...
Source: Official Site
